definition: Huizhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong
favor/benefit/to bestow/(literary) benevolence/(honorific)
surname Hui
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Huizhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong province

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位於西枝江旁，風景優美，適合居住。

sentences.english: He was a legendary figure in Huizhou.
sentences.chinese: 他可是惠州的一位傳奇人物。

sentences.english: I want to go to the Guangdong Huizhou to travel.
sentences.chinese: 我想去廣東惠州旅遊一趟。

sentences.english: To prepare for the trip, I rode to Huizhou two months ago as a test run.
sentences.chinese: 爲了準備這次旅行，我兩個月前曾騎車前往惠州。

sentences.english: What makes you come to China, and settle down in Huizhou?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼選擇來到中國，最終定居在惠州？

sentences.english: Huizhou is also considered a city of deities .
sentences.chinese: 惠州同時又是一座“神仙”集中的城市。

sentences.english: Huizhou is the first prefecture-level city to set up news spokesman system in Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 惠州市是廣東省第一個建設新聞發言人制度的地級市。

sentences.english: With Huizhou Meicai as materials, the suitable technics of low- salted Meicai vegetable was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 以惠州梅菜爲研究材料，探討梅菜低鹽化的合適工藝。

sentences.english: At the West Lake of Huizhou.
In my opinion , Huizhou is a beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，惠州是個非常漂亮的城市。

sentences.english: Ltd… We are located in Huizhou City, Canton Province, China, near Hong Kong and Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 本公司位於廣東省珠三角惠州市，毗鄰香港與深圳。

sentences.english: Chen Fengyi, whose 5-year-old son was snatched from outside her apartment building in Huizhou, said she called the police the moment she realized he was missing.
sentences.chinese: 陳鳳儀5歲大的兒子在她惠州的公寓樓外面被拐走了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anopheles species and their population in cowshed in Bogang village of Huizhou city.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查惠州市柏崗村牛房各按蚊數量及種類分佈。

sentences.english: Huizhou is located in West Zhijiang next to the beautiful scenery, suitable for living.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位於西枝江旁，風景優美，適合居住。

sentences.english: An investigation was conducted in Dongjiang tree park of Huizhou.
sentences.chinese: 文章對惠州市東江樹木園觀賞植物資源進行調查。

sentences.english: The delegation from Huizhou with FHKI representatives.
sentences.chinese: 惠州市代表團與工總代表合照。
